text: Jiří Balcárek (born 29 April 1973) is a retired Czech football player who played in the Czech First League for Olomouc and former football manager. He subsequently played for German side Union Berlin. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Czech footballers Category:Czech Republic under-21 international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Czech First League players Category:SK Sigma Olomouc players Category:1. title: Jiří Balcárek
